message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to sell you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to start with an offer of $140.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can we meet in the middle at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob, but I'm not quite comfortable with $135. I'm willing to come down a bit more. How about we try $142?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we try $139?
I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit more. How about we try $141?
I'm getting close, but I'd like to try one more time. How about we meet at $137?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $138, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll love the product!
I'm really close to my budget, but I'd like to try one last time. How about we meet at $136?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $138, Bob. That's my final offer. If you're not comfortable with that, I'll have to explore other options.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $135. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to look elsewhere. This is my final offer.
